tasks.title: Build Phase 2 Template Library with React/JSX Components
tasks.description: Create 10 specialized React/JSX slide templates for different content types with brand token integration and responsive design
tasks.details: Create templates/react/ directory with 10 components: HookSlide.jsx (bold questions/stats), TipsSlide.jsx (numbered lists with icons), StatsSlide.jsx (prominent numbers), ComparisonSlide.jsx (before/after layouts), StorySlide.jsx (patient narratives), DataSlide.jsx (Plotly integration), StepsSlide.jsx (process flows), MythSlide.jsx (myth-busting format), QuoteSlide.jsx (expert opinions), CTASlide.jsx (call-to-action). Each template must accept props for content/colors/variant, use brand tokens from tokens.py, support 4:5 (1080x1350) and 1:1 (1080x1080) aspect ratios, maintain WCAG AA contrast, and limit text to 15 words per slide.
tasks.testStrategy: Test each template with sample data, verify aspect ratio switching, validate WCAG AA contrast ratios, confirm 15-word limit enforcement, and ensure brand token integration works correctly

tasks.title: Build Phase 3 Rendering Engine with Satori and Pillow
tasks.description: Implement the rendering pipeline using Satori for React-to-PNG conversion with Pillow fallback and intelligent routing
tasks.details: Create services/satori-service/package.json with Satori, React, and dependencies. Build services/satori-service/index.js as HTTP server that converts React components to PNG using Satori. Enhance pillow_renderer.py as fallback renderer when Satori is unavailable. Create scripts/visual_router.py to intelligently select rendering tool based on slide type complexity (use Satori for React components, Pillow for simple layouts). Implement error handling and graceful fallbacks between rendering engines.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Satori service with all 10 template types, verify Pillow fallback activation, validate PNG output quality and dimensions, test routing logic with various slide types, and ensure error handling works properly

tasks.title: Build Phase 4 Content Intelligence System
tasks.description: Implement AI-powered content structuring, hook generation, and research integration for automatic carousel creation
tasks.details: Create scripts/content_structurer.py to convert topics or long-form content into structured slide JSON using ANTHROPIC_API_KEY. Implement 4A Framework classifier (Actionable, Analytical, Aspirational, Anthropological) for content categorization. Build scripts/hooks_generator.py with proven hook patterns for engagement. Integrate PubMed MCP for research when topic is provided. Add dynamic color mode selection logic (light/dark per slide based on content sentiment and type). Use existing API keys from .env configuration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test topic-to-slides conversion with various medical topics, validate 4A Framework classification accuracy, verify hook generation effectiveness, test PubMed integration with sample queries, and confirm dynamic color selection works appropriately

tasks.title: Build Phase 5 Quality Assurance System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive quality validation including accessibility, text density, voice consistency, and brand compliance
tasks.details: Enhance scripts/quality_checker.py with WCAG AA contrast validation (4.5:1 minimum ratio). Add text density validator that rejects slides exceeding 15 words. Integrate anti-AI voice checker to ensure natural, human-like content. Implement brand consistency validator against brand tokens. Create mobile preview generator that displays all slides in a grid format for quick review. Add automated scoring system for overall carousel quality.
tasks.testStrategy: Test contrast validation with edge cases, verify 15-word limit enforcement, validate anti-AI voice detection accuracy, confirm brand consistency checking, and ensure mobile preview generation works across different screen sizes

tasks.title: Build Phase 6 Integration and CLI Interface
tasks.description: Complete the carousel generator with Content-OS integration, CLI interface, batch processing, and caption generation
tasks.details: Add Content-OS integration for forward mode (topic to all content types) and backward mode (long-form to carousel). Create comprehensive CLI interface for standalone usage with argument parsing and help documentation. Implement batch generation support for processing multiple topics simultaneously. Build caption and hashtag generator per carousel using content intelligence. Update SKILL.md with comprehensive usage examples, API documentation, and integration guides.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Content-OS integration in both modes, verify CLI functionality with various input types, validate batch processing with multiple topics, confirm caption/hashtag generation quality, and ensure documentation completeness
